text: One day the fox and the crocodile were arguing about their ancestral nobility. For a long time the crocodile spoke about the alcurnia of his ancestors, and ended up saying that his parents had become the guards of the gymnasium. "You don't have to tell me", replied the fox. "The qualities of your skin show very well that you have been doing gymnastics for many years. Always remember that what looks good can't be hidden by lying.
title: La zorra y el cocodrilo
author: nan Esopo
